articles.title: Yorkshire Ripper: Cop recalls horror of letting Peter Sutcliffe go after rightly suspecting he was killer in - The Sun
articles.content:

It was July 1979 when Laptew spoke to Sutcliffe at his home in Heaton, West Yorks… [+9978 chars]
